title: Google looks to be building Bluetooth tracker detection directly into Android
content:
While Apple in no way invented Bluetooth trackers, AirTags undoubtedly popularized the category this past year. There are ongoing concerns about these readily available devices being used to track people, and tag makers have taken steps to counter that. Google might soon add a Bluetooth tracker detection capability directly into Android.

moreâ€¦

The post Google looks to be building Bluetooth tracker detection directly into Android appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple did not invent Bluetooth trackers, but AirTags popularized the category. Google could be making tracker detection a part of Android...
